Method Detail

getCompassClassMapping

CompassClassMapping getCompassClassMapping(GrailsDomainClass grailsDomainClass, java.util.Collection searchableGrailsDomainClasses, java.lang.Object closure, java.util.List excludedProperties)
Get the CompassMappingDescription for the given GrailsDomainClass and "searchable" value
param:
grailsDomainClass the Grails domain class
param:
searchableGrailsDomainClasses a collection of searchable GrailsDomainClass instances
param:
searchableValue the searchable value: Closure in this case
param:
excludedProperties a List of excluded properties NOT to map; ignored in this impl
return:
the CompassMappingDescription

getCompassClassPropertyMappings

java.util.List getCompassClassPropertyMappings(GrailsDomainClass grailsDomainClass, java.util.Collection searchableGrailsDomainClasses, java.lang.Object searchableValue, java.util.List excludedProperties)
Get the property mappings for the given GrailsDomainClass
param:
grailsDomainClass the Grails domain class
param:
searchableGrailsDomainClasses a collection of searchable GrailsDomainClass instances
param:
searchableValue the searchable value: true|false|Map|Closure
param:
excludedProperties a List of properties NOT to map; may be ignored by impl
return:
a List of CompassClassPropertyMapping

handlesSearchableValue

public boolean handlesSearchableValue(java.lang.Object searchableValue)
Does the implementation handle th given "searchable" value type?
param:
searchableValue a searchable value
return:
true for Closure for this class
